Text: Actually, I think the hold'em bible is Super System 2... Oh, and Mason Malmuth had a book that was also considered hold'em-bible-ish... if you have that one too it would rule. Thanks for this one though
Don't have Super System 2, i'm looking for it also, and all other good reading about Texas Hold'em Poker.
This isn't the entire 600 pg book but an excerpt (115 pgs), mostly the No Limit Hold'em stuff by Doyle Brunson himself, which is still excellent material over 25 years later.
